login
Class LoginAuthenticator

java.lang.Object
  login.LoginAuthenticator

public class LoginAuthenticator
extends java.lang.Object

LoginAuthenticator contains methods to verify the authenticity of a user attempting to log into the trading platform.

Author:
shoshana.kesselman

Method Detail

passwordMatch

public boolean passwordMatch(java.util.Collection<User> users,
                             java.lang.String password)
Returns true if a password was found in the collection of users and false otherwise.

Parameters:
users - A collection of users currently able to log into the system.
password - typed by the person currently attempting to log in
Returns:
Returns true if the password was found amongst the given collection of users.

userNameMatch

returnMatchedUser

public User returnMatchedUser(java.util.Collection<User> users,
                              java.lang.String userName,
                              java.lang.String password)
                       throws NoUserException
NoUserException Person will be notified that they have not been able to log in successfully.

Parameters:
users - Collection of users for the Trading Platform.
userName - Username that was typed in by the current user attempting to log in.
password - Password that was typed in by the current user attempting to log in.
Returns:
Returns the user whose username and password matches those passed into the method.
Throws:
NoUserException - Throws NoUserException was a matching user was not found.
See Also:
NoUserException
